title: Greetings, Carbon-Based Bipeds!: A Vision of the 20th Century As It Happened
description: Collected essays by the brilliant Scifi novelist, technological prophet, whose cultural conscience and scientific powers warned us of the perils of unchecked power and greed and the alarming sophistication of weapons of global mass destruction. One can rightly say that Sir. Clarke can uniquely provide a coda for our century. Entertaining & thought-provoking.
author: Arthur C. Clarke
